submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        hl=len(nums)//2
        n=[0]*hl
        for i in range(len(n)):
            n[i]=(abs(nums[i]-nums[-i-1]),min(k,max(nums[i],k-nums[i],nums[-i-1],k-nums[-i-1])))
        prefix=[0]*(k+1)
        #print(n)
        for i in n:
            prefix[i[1]]+=1
        for i in range(1,len(prefix)):
            prefix[i]+=prefix[i-1]
        #print(prefix)

        res=maxsize
        c=Counter(i for i,_ in n)
        #print(c)
        for i in c:
            #print(hl-c[i],i)
            res=min(res,hl-c[i]+ (prefix[i-1] if i>0 else 0))
        #print(c)
        #print(prefix)
        return res
